title: 98/208/EC: Commission Decision of 3 March 1998 concerning a request for exemption submitted by Luxembourg pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 March 1998 concerning a request for exemption submitted by Luxembourg pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers (Only the French text is authentic) (98/208/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The request submitted by Luxembourg for an exemption concerning one type of gas discharge lamp for four types of headlamps is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 March 1998.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission
